name: Heaven, Hell and the Neitherworld
description:
Not so secret, secret Agent Brent finds his soul taken by an evil entity with an overly long name too long to mention here. Agent Brent must travel to Hell, Heaven and the neutral plane Neitherworld to reclaim his soul, because otherwise it will really mess up Death's paperwork.

Previously Known as "Limbo the Adventure Game" - Now changed to avoid confusion with "Limbo".  (My game was first announced as just "Limbo" in 2007 on the Adventure Game Studio forums)
